Comment: Not the best move for white. Black will gladly play into the Center Game opening. It allows black to gain a tempo by developing a knight with a threat on white's queen.

An odd move. I don't see any reasonable refutation by white, so it looks like a free pawn to me - and a threat on white's queen again. I'm expecting 6. Qe2 which then threatens 7. f4 to kill the pinned knight.
